        public RootContainer createRootContainer(Layout layout)
        Description copied from class: Terminal
        Constructs and returns a new RootContainer using this terminal as the context, and the given layout as the super layout of all Components within the terminal.
        Overrides:
        createRootContainer in class Terminal
        Parameters:
        layout - The layout to use for placing Components within this terminal.
        Returns:
        A new RootContainer which has been constructed for this terminal with the given layout.

        protected DrawableSurface createDrawableSurface(int width,
                                                int height)
        Description copied from class: Terminal
        Initializes the area that text will be rendered to. This surface should be capable of transforming a GlyphBuffer into a representation suitable for output to the client machine.
        Specified by:
        createDrawableSurface in class Terminal
        Parameters:
        width - The number of characters wide the surface should be able to render.
        height - The number of character tall the surface should be able to render.
